data.lyric:
[ti:Moth To A Flame]
[ar:Swedish House Mafia/The Weeknd]
[al:Moth To A Flame]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.20]Moth To A Flame - Swedish House Mafia/The Weeknd
[00:01.28]Lyrics by：Abel Tesfaye
[00:01.82]Composed by：Carl Nordström/Sebastian Ingrosso/Steve Angello/Axel Hedfors
[00:04.13]
[00:15.54]Like a moth to a flame
[00:19.98]
[00:21.14]I'll pull you in I'll pull you back to
[00:25.57]What you need initially
[00:29.94]
[00:31.52]It's just one call away ayy ayy
[00:36.54]
[00:37.06]And you'll leave him you're loyal to me
[00:41.49]But this time I'll let you be
[00:45.86]'Cause he seems like he's good for you
[00:50.00]And he makes you feel like you should
[00:53.89]And all your friends say "He's the one"
[00:57.96]His love for you is true
[01:01.42]
[01:02.14]But does he know you call me when he sleeps
[01:09.91]Or does he know the pictures that you keep
[01:17.96]Or does he know the reasons that you cry
[01:26.00]Or tell me does he know where your heart lies
[01:34.25]Where it truly lies
[01:37.09]
[01:38.72]Yeah you should be with him I let you go from time
[01:45.73]
[01:47.67]You should stay with him
[01:50.04]'Cause he seems like he's good for you
[01:53.94]And he makes you feel like you should
[01:57.93]And all your friends say "He's the one"
[02:01.96]His love for you is true
[02:05.64]Ooh
[02:05.96]But does he know you call me when he sleeps
[02:13.95]Or does he know the pictures that you keep
[02:21.88]Or does he know the reasons that you cry
[02:29.94]Or tell me does he know where your heart lies
[02:38.21]Where it truly lies
[02:41.07]
[02:43.96]Right here with me baby
[02:45.35]
[02:46.41]Where it truly lies
[02:48.90]
[02:51.79]My baby
[02:53.21]
[02:54.32]Where it truly lies
[02:57.07]
[02:59.72]Give me all of it
[03:00.49]
[03:02.20]Where it truly lies
[03:05.32]
[03:10.00]Where it truly lies
[03:12.81]
[03:26.32]Where it truly lies
[03:28.80]
[03:42.18]Where it truly lies
data.trans:
[ti:Moth To A Flame]
[ar:Swedish House Mafia/The Weeknd]
[al:Moth To A Flame]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.20]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.28]//
[00:01.82]//
[00:04.13]
[00:15.54]就像是飞蛾扑火一般
[00:19.98]
[00:21.14]我会将你俘获 我会让你重新找回
[00:25.57]你心中最初的美好憧憬
[00:29.94]
[00:31.52]其实只需要一通电话就能做到
[00:36.54]
[00:37.06]你会离他而去 你会忠于我
[00:41.49]但这一次我会放手 将你推开
[00:45.86]因为他看起来与你是天作之合
[00:50.00]他让你觉得你应该珍惜这缘分
[00:53.89]你所有的朋友都认为他是你的真命天子
[00:57.96]他对你的爱是如此真挚
[01:01.42]
[01:02.14]但他是否知道 你趁他熟睡时给我打来电话
[01:09.91]他是否知道 你还保存着那些充满回忆的照片
[01:17.96]他是否知道 你伤心落泪的缘由
[01:26.00]或者请告诉我 他是否知道 你的真心究竟在何处
[01:34.25]你心的真正归宿在哪里
[01:37.09]
[01:38.72]你应该与他在一起 我会将你慢慢忘记
[01:45.73]
[01:47.67]你应该与他相依相伴
[01:50.04]因为他看起来与你是天作之合
[01:53.94]他让你觉得你应该珍惜这缘分
[01:57.93]你所有的朋友都认为他是你的真命天子
[02:01.96]他对你的爱是如此真挚
[02:05.64]//
[02:05.96]但他是否知道 你趁他熟睡时给我打来电话
[02:13.95]他是否知道 你还保存着那些充满回忆的照片
[02:21.88]他是否知道 你伤心落泪的缘由
[02:29.94]或者请告诉我 他是否知道 你的真心究竟在何处
[02:38.21]你心的真正归宿在哪里
[02:41.07]
[02:43.96]与我厮守在一起 宝贝
[02:45.35]
[02:46.41]这就是你心的真正归宿
[02:48.90]
[02:51.79]我的宝贝
[02:53.21]
[02:54.32]这就是你心的真正归宿
[02:57.07]
[02:59.72]为我付出全部的爱
[03:00.49]
[03:02.20]这就是你心的真正归宿
[03:05.32]
[03:10.00]这就是你心的真正归宿
[03:12.81]
[03:26.32]这就是你心的真正归宿
[03:28.80]
[03:42.18]这就是你心的真正归宿
